body_html: Based on my experiments, I got error "THCudaCheck FAIL file=/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu line=58 error=2 : out of memory" when doing torch.cuda.sparse.FloatTensor(...) even with very small tensors (the one in the doc example)
body_text: Based on my experiments, I got error "THCudaCheck FAIL file=/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu line=58 error=2 : out of memory" when doing torch.cuda.sparse.FloatTensor(...) even with very small tensors (the one in the doc example)
body: Based on my experiments, I got error "THCudaCheck FAIL file=/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu line=58 error=2 : out of memory" when doing `torch.cuda.sparse.FloatTensor(...)` even with very small tensors (the one in the doc example)
